text:
Close.io | REMOTE | Senior UI/JavaScript Frontend Engineer

WHO ARE WE: At Close.io we’re building the sales communication platform of the future. We’ve built a next-generation CRM that eliminates manual data entry and helps sales teams close more deals. We are hiring engineers to help us unify the world's sales calls and emails into one beautiful workflow.

http://close.io

https://jobs.lever.co/close.io/10a1e32b-1a59-48dc-b8f4-e6f0d...
